overview:
Peter McLachlan is the chief architect and a co-founder at Mobify.

Peter has worked in numerous areas of the computer industry including Linux services consulting, web development, data visualization research, server operations, high performance cluster deployment and most recently client-side web technologies. Peter has published peer reviewed research papers in haptics and data visualization. He took a leap into the mobile space with an SMS based transit schedule system developed jointly with John Boxall & Igor Faletski. This experience expanded into a full-grown mobile habit while exploring python on early Nokia S60 devices in the early days of smart phones.

Today, Mobify is the leading mobile web platform provider, powering hundreds of millions of mobile pageviews for e-commerce and publisher customers globally.
